Module io.github.wander.inventorymanager
Package io.github.wander.inventorymanager

Class PartController

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.wander.inventorymanager.PartController
  • public class PartController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all the logic that is involved with the execution of the PartView
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jordan Neuenschwander

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static boolean isModify
      A flag that is used to show when the view is executing in modify part mode or add part mode
      private javafx.scene.control.Label labelAddPart
      Header text that changes based on modify or add part
      private javafx.scene.control.Label labelMachIDPart
      A label that is used to label the machine ID or company name text box
      private static int modPartIndex
      The index of the part being modified
      private static int nextPartId
      An autogenerated unique integer value used for initializing the id of new Part objects
      private javafx.scene.control.RadioButton radioHousePart
      The radio button next to the label InHouse
      private javafx.scene.control.RadioButton radioOutPart
      The radio button next to the label OutSourced
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField textPartCPI
      A text box used for user input of the cost per unit / price
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField textPartId
      A text box used for user input of the part id
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField textPartMachId
      A text box used for user input of the machine ID or company name depending on radio button selection
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField textPartMax
      A text box used for user input of the maximum stock allowed
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField textPartMin
      A text box used for user input of the minimum stock allowed

      A text box used for user input of the part name
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField textPartStock
      A text box used for user input of the part stock

    • Constructor Detail

      • PartController

        public PartController()

    • Method Detail

      • addView

        public void addView()
        This method sets up the view to be in the state where it has the add part functionality It sets a flag so the controller knows which mode the view is in.

      • modifyView

        public void modifyView​(int index,
                       Part modifyPart)
        This method sets up the view to be in a "modify part" state. It prints the data stored in a Part object to the relevant text boxes and sets a flag so the controller knows what mode the view is in
        Parameters:
        index - the index where the modifyPart is located
        modifyPart - the part to be modified

      • clearPage

        private void clearPage()
        Clears the text boxes and sets the radio buttons and relevant labels to their default state

      • onClickCancel

        void onClickCancel​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Asks the user if they would like to return to the MainView and goes to the main view upon confirmation
        Parameters:
        event - the event thrown when the cancel button is clicked
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - NullPointerException when the FXMLLoader can not find the fxml file
        java.lang.Exception - IOException if FXMLLoader attempts to load a null value

      • onClickRadioHouse

        void onClickRadioHouse​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method checks if the in house radio button is selected. If it is then it sets the label to "Machine ID" and clears the input text
        Parameters:
        event - the event thrown when the radio button for In House is clicked

      • onClickRadioOut

        void onClickRadioOut​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method checks if the out sourced radio button is select. If it is, it changes the label to "Company Name" and clears the input text
        Parameters:
        event - the event thrown when the radio button for out sourced is clicked

      • onClickSavePart

        void onClickSavePart​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        This method creates a new InHouse or OutSourced object from the user input. User input is validated before it is accepted. It then instructs the MainController to either add this part or update an existing part in the list of all parts. Then it changes the stage to the main view and resets the parts view to its default state
        Parameters:
        event - the event thrown when the save button is clicked
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - NullPointerException if FXMLLoader cannot find the fxml file
        java.lang.Exception - IOException if FXMLLoader attempts to load a null value
